as.description: The element or component the RadioGroup.Option should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the RadioGroup.Option should render as.

value.description:
The value of the current RadioGroup.Option. The type should match the
type of the value in the RadioGroup component.
value.description_zh:
The value of the current RadioGroup.Option. The type should match the
type of the value in the RadioGroup component.

:active.description: Whether or not the option is active (using the mouse or keyboard).
:active.description_zh: Whether or not the option is active (using the mouse or keyboard).

:checked.description: Whether or not the current option is the checked value.
:checked.description_zh: Whether or not the current option is the checked value.

:disabled.description: Whether or not the current option is disabled.
:disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the current option is disabled.
